snippet: At 1 Sutton Place South, one of two maisonettes at the 1927 riverside co-op is for sale for $10.25 million.
abstract: Apartment at 1 Sutton Place South is poised to enter the market at $10.25 million; it is one of two maisonettes at the 1927 riverside co-op, which was designed by Rosario Candela.
lead_paragraph: At 1 Sutton Place South, one of two maisonettes at the 1927 riverside co-op is for sale for $10.25 million.

headline.seo: Sutton Place South Apartment for $10.25 Million
